endpoints.description: Register a new employee and initiate the onboarding process.
Retrieve detailed information about a specific employee.
Update the submitted documents for the specified employee.
Assign predefined training modules to new hires during onboarding.
List all pending tasks within the onboarding workflow.
Mark a specified task as completed for an employee.
Generate a report of the onboarding status segmented by departmental units.
Remove an existing employee's onboarding profile.
Retrieve all available training modules for employees.
Update the completion status of a training module for a specific employee.
